name: Gorgeous FREE gift box, ribbons and wrapping...
description:
Thought I'd post up some pictures, so you can see how I wrap and package jewellery, in black boxes with a very pretty gold embroidered ribbon.  Then I wrap  the box up extra safely, in tissue and double bubble wrap!   Let me know if you have any special requests, I *love* wrapping presents...

All wrapping and packaging is included in the postage and packing and insurance price, which is paid for at checkout (£3).

name: White Pearl Ring
description:
I adore freshwater pearls.  They gleam and are just so...perfect.

This delicate ring is glamorous and timeless, and I cannot take mine off, it looks great for everyday wear as it matches every outfit and all types of jewellery.

A glowing white pearl (6-7mm) is wrapped in sterling silver wire, to make this exceptionally dainty ring.

Hand formed from solid sterling silver wire twisted together, the ring is then polished.  It is simple and understated.

This ring looks wonderful alone, and fabulous alongside  the other pearl jewellery.  These rings also look very pretty indeed worn two together, as they are delicate and stackable, and nestle together comfortably.
 
Your ring will be made to order, and custom sized - so please be sure to let me know the ring size you desire at checkout, or in an email.

This ring cannont be resized and I cannot be responsible if you give me a wrong size - so it's well worth checking your size at your local jewellers before ordering if you are not sure.

Soon to be available in 14K gold plated.  The brilliant lustre of freshwater pearls catches the light brilliantly, so they will look lovely with gold, what do you think?  Prefer gold?  E-mail me!

I need around 3-5 days to make and post out this ring, but do email me if you need a quick order or have a special date in mind.

name: Classic Pearl Earrings
description:
Classic, pure white freshwater pearls.  Gamorous and timeless, and I cannot take mine off!

Gleaming white pearls (6-7mm) dangles from a solid sterling silver wire hoops, and swing gently from hallmarked solid sterling silver hooks, at a dainty 2cm long.

These earrings are lightly polished, simple, and understated.  The brilliant lustre of the freshwater pearl has a slight pinkish lustre, which catches the light fabulously.

This necklace looks wonderful alone, and outstanding alongside other classic pearl jewellery.   A matching etched solid silver angel wing necklace is priced at £25, and a made to order pearl  ring is also available.

name: Angel Wing White Pearl Necklace
description:
Classic, pure white freshwater pearl necklace - glamorous and timeless.

A gleaming white pearl (6-7mm) nestles alongside a beautiful etched solid sterling silver angel wing - perfect when you are feeling (or wanting to look) angelic!

The necklace is lightly polished, simple, and understated, and hangs from a 16" solid sterling silver chain. The brilliant lustre of the freshwater pearl has a slight pinkish lustre, which catches the light excellently.

This necklace looks wonderful alone, and fabulous alongside the other classic pearl jewellery.

Email me with any questions, it's always great to hear from you!

name: Pearl and Amethyst Raindrop Necklace
description:
A singular necklace, with pearl and amethyst 'raindrops', set on a solid sterling silver leaf..

The silver leaf was cast from a leaf carving, which I poured molten silver into (destroying the carving... - ouch! - there have only been three of these carved necklaces so far - they are pretty special, exciting to make and fabulously unique!). This makes this a one off design - no chance of repeating this exact shape or form!

The raindrop is a  3.5mm African Amethyst - a natural gemstone, a rich, transparent pale lilac colour -  cut in a faceted design so it sparkles, just like a delicate rain drop...

The large white lustrous freshwater pearl is 6mm in diameter, and perfectly round and unblemished.

The pendant is 1.7cm at its widest, and 3cm long. It hangs from a 18 inch (41cm) solid sterling silver chain. It is a simply lovely necklace - not too large - refined, elegant and organic.  The organic texture is emphasised by highly polished veins, which contrast their shine with the chalky dappled texture behind them.

The process of making this necklace, with its own carving, means there is no way of recreating this pendant. I have only made three gemstone raindrop necklaces so far, and each is unique in size, shape and gemstone, ensuring you will have a exclusive, designer item of jewellery.
